issue.title: Add a way to configure identity columns and triggers for split entities

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Add support for annotations to mapping fragments, property overrides and sequences
Update back-reference on mapping fragments and overrides when reattaching

Fixes #28195
Fixes #28237
